landing.subTitle: Riding the Waves of Exceptional Installations and Water Park Services

content.subTitle: Installation:
content.subContent: We offer 'Technical Advisor' or 'full-scope installation' services delivered by our highly qualified team.

content.subTitle: Maintenance & Refurbishment:
content.subContent: Our skilled technicians are adept at handling all repair projects concerning composite elements.

content.subTitle: Design & Sales:
content.subContent: We craft tailored solutions for both new developments and existing projects.

content.subTitle: Installation:
content.subContent: We offer product assembly supported by our experienced technical advisors and installers.

content.subTitle: Consulting:
content.subContent: Our team can assist you in creating comprehensive master plans and managing your project from the initial concept through to installation.

content.subTitle: Hydromechanical systems:
content.subContent: We guarantee the installation of high-quality, energy-efficient systems for water treatment, circulation, and filtration.

content.subTitle: Water Technology:
content.subContent: We provide a variety of features designed to enhance the aquatic experience for people of all ages, including Wave Pools, Rivers, and Surf Pools.
Our team specializes in assembling both carbon and stainless steel structures, including platforms, warehouses, shelters, industrial buildings, stairs, and handrails.

Our high-quality theming systems are built for durability and designed to complement the surrounding environment. Offerings include Foam-Rubber Tile Flooring, pebble decoration, artificial rocks, facades, and furniture components.

We provide comprehensive safety management for water parks and leisure pools, including inspections, safety certifications per European and American standards, technical audits, and advisory services.
In partnership with DOF Robotics in Poland, we are excited to bring water fun to the metaverse through high-quality, immersive and visually engaging VR scenarios.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subTitle: our projects presence across the globe

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.subTitle: Be the first one to know

success.title: Welcome to Our Community!
success.message: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter! You’re now on the list to receive the latest updates, and insights directly to your inbox.

error.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
error.message: Unfortunately, we were unable to process your subscription at this time. Please check your email address and try again. If you continue to experience issues, don’t hesitate to contact us for assistance. Thank you for your understanding!

whyWe.title: Experience
whyWe.paragraph: Our entire staff has over ten years of expertise in the industry.

whyWe.title: Customer Care
whyWe.paragraph: We provide online customer service 24 hours a day, seven days a week, and we are a customer-focused, customer-satisfaction-oriented organization.

whyWe.title: Know How
whyWe.paragraph: With our skilled team, we are constantly ready to offer fresh ideas and consultation to our consumers.

whyWe.title: Quality
whyWe.paragraph: Our products, services, and materials are all of the highest quality.

whyWe.title: Competitive Prices
whyWe.paragraph: We provide high-quality service at reasonable prices.

whyWe.title: Warranty
whyWe.paragraph: Our services and goods are covered by a variety of warranties.

whyWe.title: Safety
whyWe.paragraph: Our top goal is the health and safety of people and the environment, as well as the long-term durability of our products.

companyVision.title: Vision
companyVision.paragraph: We want to bring water fun to people of all ages all over the world.

companyMission.title: Mission
companyMission.paragraph: We want to provide flexible solutions to big and small clients, whatever their needs.

companyPeople: Waveast Installation & Park Services was founded by two engineers with over ten years of industry experience. Additionally, Waveast has a global presence due to its dynamic technical team and strategic alliances with partners worldwide.
With a customer-focused after-sales team and competent designers and engineers, Waveast strives to provide the best service possible to its clients.
aboutCompany: Founded in {{yearFounded}} in the lively city of Warsaw, Poland, Waveast represents a strong commitment to the amusement and entertainment industry. Our founder's vision and passion have shaped our journey, driving us to create exciting experiences for people around the world. With a talented team of over {{teamSize}} professionals, we blend expertise and dedication to deliver high-quality solutions for hotels, theme parks, waterparks, and camping sites.

Our team includes skilled engineers, installers, repairmen, and office staff, all working together to ensure that every project meets our high standards. With more than a decade of collective experience, we pride ourselves on being efficient and effective in our operations. This commitment has allowed us to build a diverse portfolio of over {{projectCount}} successful projects across {{countryCount}} countries.

Waveast stands out as a leading name in the industry, with a strong presence in the EMEA, APAC, and LATAM regions. We are passionate about pushing the boundaries of entertainment and creating unforgettable experiences for people of all ages.
servicesCompany: Waveast Installation & Park Services is a leading provider of comprehensive solutions for the amusement and entertainment industry. With a strong commitment to excellence, we deliver client-driven services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client.
Here’s a glimpse of what we offer:
projectsCompany: Waveast Installation & Park Services has successfully completed numerous projects around the world, showcasing our expertise in creating exceptional amusement items and water parks. Our global presence reflects our commitment to excellence and our ability to meet diverse client needs across various environments.
At Waveast We understand that each project is unique, and we are committed to delivering memorable experiences for our clients and their customers.
contactCompany: For all inquiries, use the contact form or reach out directly using the contact information provided below.

error.validSubject: Subject must be at least two characters
error.validMessage: Message must be at least two characters

success.title: Thank You for Reaching Out!
success.message: Your message has been sent successfully. We appreciate your interest and will get back to you as soon as possible.

error.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
error.message: We encountered an error while trying to send your message. Please try again or reach out to us directly via our contact information.
